document_data.mainbody:
{{Quote|The Great Queens of Tethyr ruled well from that castle, and I would see it become a castle again.|Queen [[Zaranda Star]] when declaring her intent to rule and make [[Darromar]] her capital.<ref name=LoI3:T-p41>}}
The '''Royal Palace of Faerntarn''' (formerly '''Gallowglass Hall''') was the royal palace of [[Tethyr]] after the [[Tethyrian Interregnum#Reclamation Wars|Reclamation Wars]].<ref name=LoI3:T-p83>
document_data.Location: The palace was built upon the [[Ithal Crag]] within the [[Royal Quarter]] of the capital city of Darromar. Sitting atop the hill, Faerntarn afforded a view of the whole city.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

Structure.Defenses:
The castle was entered through a [[wikipedia:en:Barbican|barbican]] gate with three [[wikipedia:en:Portcullis|portcullises]]. The towered walls provided defense, and each building contained additional protections as well.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

The knightly order known as the [[Warriors of the Star]], many of whom were formerly members of [[Star Protective Services]], defended the palace. Their barracks were in the South Tower of the castle.

document_data.Interior: The garrison building provided housing for the royal guards and court staff. The original castle structure included 70 rooms, and these were used by the royal family, their direct advisers, and closest friends.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>
document_data.History:
Construction on the original castle was begun in the [[841 DR|Year of the Hunted Elk (841 DR)]] and completed two years later in the [[843 DR|Year of Amber]]. It was originally built as a residence for the in-laws of Queen [[Alisande]].<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

In [[1264 DR]], tombs within the palace were robbed, but the building was not further harmed.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

During the [[Tethyrian Interregnum#Ten Black Days of Eleint|Ten Black Days of Eleint]] in [[1347 DR]], the palace was razed and looted for being the residence of former royalty.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

In [[1349 DR]], the building was restored by the [[Gallowglass family]] and became Gallowglass Hall.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

During the Reclamation Wars, in [[1367 DR]], Zaranda Star and the [[Company of Eight]] attacked both Gallowglass Hall and the nearby [[Krimmevol Hall]] in a successful attempt to overthrow the tyrant [[Julian Gallowglass]].<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>

Zaranda Star used her own fortunes as an adventuress to restore Faertarn. The castle was ready for her coronation as queen in under a year's time. Krimmevol Hall was integrated into the complex (to become the garrison building) at that time.<ref name=LoI3:T-p83/>
